overview: Ah-Lim has been selling Bak Kwa (barbecued pork slices) for twenty-five years. His greatest hope is that his only child, Jason, will elevate the business to another level someday. But Ah-Lim will soon be forced to re-evaluate his relationship with his son and the future of his business when the latter brings an unexpected guest home for dinner.
title: Bak Kwa
